statements: SELECT * FROM LanguageRules;
SELECT rule_name, rule_description FROM LanguageRules;
SELECT rule_id, rule_name, rule_description FROM LanguageRules WHERE rule_id = 1;
SELECT rule_name, interpretation_expression FROM LanguageRules WHERE rule_description LIKE '%parsing%';
SELECT * FROM LanguageRules ORDER BY rule_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM LanguageRules WHERE rule_name = 'Syntax Validation';
SELECT rule_id, rule_name FROM LanguageRules WHERE rule_id > 5 ORDER BY rule_id DESC;
SELECT rule_name, parsing_expression FROM LanguageRules WHERE LENGTH(parsing_expression) > 100 ORDER BY rule_name LIMIT 10;
SELECT rule_name, rule_description, interpretation_expression FROM LanguageRules WHERE interpretation_expression LIKE '%execute%' ORDER BY rule_id LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM LanguageRules WHERE rule_id IN (1, 3, 5, 7) ORDER BY rule_id;
SELECT * FROM language_rules;
SELECT rule_name, rule_description FROM language_rules ORDER BY rule_name DESC;
SELECT input_text FROM text_inputs WHERE language_rule_id = 1;
SELECT rule_name, rule_description FROM language_rules WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM language_rules WHERE rule_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT rule_name, rule_description FROM language_rules WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM text_inputs WHERE language_rule_id = 10 ORDER BY input_id DESC;
SELECT rule_name, LENGTH(rule_description) AS description_length FROM language_rules WHERE rule_name LIKE '%rule%' ORDER BY rule_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_inputs FROM text_inputs WHERE language_rule_id = 5 GROUP BY language_rule_id;
SELECT DISTINCT rule_name FROM language_rules WHERE LENGTH(rule_description) > 100;
SELECT * FROM Languages ORDER BY language_name DESC
SELECT language_name, parser_version FROM Languages
SELECT keyword, rule FROM LanguageRules WHERE id = 1
SELECT * FROM TextInputs WHERE language_id = 2
SELECT id, language_name FROM Languages
SELECT * FROM LanguageRules WHERE id = 1;
SELECT language_name, parser_version FROM Languages WHERE id = 3;
SELECT keyword, rule FROM LanguageRules WHERE keyword = 'IF' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT input FROM TextInputs WHERE language_id = 2 ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT language_name, parser_version FROM Languages WHERE parser_version LIKE '%2.0%';
SELECT * FROM language_rules;
SELECT rule_description, rule_syntax FROM language_rules;
SELECT input_text, input_language_id FROM text_inputs WHERE input_language_id = 1;
SELECT keyword FROM language_keywords WHERE language_id = 2;
SELECT input_id, input_text FROM text_inputs ORDER BY input_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM language_rules WHERE rule_id = 1;
SELECT rule_description FROM language_rules WHERE rule_id > 2;
SELECT rule_id, rule_description FROM language_rules WHERE rule_description LIKE '%syntax%';
SELECT * FROM text_inputs WHERE input_language_id = 3 ORDER BY input_id DESC;
SELECT input_text, input_language_id FROM text_inputs WHERE input_id BETWEEN 2 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM languages;
SELECT language_name FROM languages WHERE language_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM texts WHERE text_id = 10;
SELECT token_name, token_type FROM tokens WHERE token_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT rule_name, rule_expression FROM rules ORDER BY rule_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM languages;
SELECT language_id, language_name FROM languages WHERE language_id = 2;
SELECT text_content FROM texts WHERE text_id = 1;
SELECT token_name, token_type FROM tokens ORDER BY token_type DESC, token_name ASC;
SELECT r.rule_name, r.rule_expression, l.language_name FROM rules r JOIN languages l ON r.language_id = l.language_id;
